page.title: 07Burford Transport & Traffic
page.content: Burford relies to an enormous extent on private cars.Most families make use of their own cars often. Almost half the people go to work by car or by motor cycle. Few go by cycle or by bus. Many car owners shop outside Burford and go elsewhere for recreation.The busy A361 Road brings heavy traffic to Burford High Street,particularly lorry traffic. Most people are in favour of rerouting this via a by-pass.Local tradespeople oppose this because they fear loss of business.Some residents and visitors feel that the parking facilities are not adequately used.They suggest that the provision of a by-pass backed up with improved parking facilities would relieve the town of its present overloaded traffic conditions.
